I find that static methods are easy to move around but more difficult to de=
compose. If I see a complicated static method I look first at the parameter=
 list to see if there is a natural home for the method. If not, I consider =
making a method object (cf Implementation Patterns), converting the paramet=
ers to fields, and then extracting parameterless helper methods (ibid).
 
C=
heers,
